   19: %%
   20: 
   21: %%
   22: %% Test service and transport config. In particular, of the detection
   23: %% of config errors.
   24: %%
   25: 
   26: -module(diameter_config_SUITE).
   27: 
   28: %% testscases, no common_test dependency
   29: -export([run/0,
   30:          run/1]).
   31: 
   32: %% common_test wrapping
   33: -export([suite/0,
   34:          all/0,
   35:          start_service/1,
   36:          add_transport/1]).
   37: 
   38: -define(util, diameter_util).
   39: 
   40: %% Lists of {Key, GoodConfigList, BadConfigList} with which to
   41: %% configure.
   42: 
   43: -define(SERVICE_CONFIG,
   44:         [{application,
   45:           [[[{dictionary, diameter_gen_base_rfc6733},
   46:              {module, ?MODULE}]]
   47:            | [[[{dictionary, D},
   48:                 {module, M},
   49:                 {alias, A},
   50:                 {state, S},
   51:                 {answer_errors, AE},
   52:                 {request_errors, RE},
   53:                 {call_mutates_state, C}]]
   54:               || D <- [diameter_gen_base_rfc3588, diameter_gen_base_rfc6733],
   55:                  M <- [?MODULE, [?MODULE, diameter_lib:now()]],
   56:                  A <- [0, common, make_ref()],
   57:                  S <- [[], make_ref()],
   58:                  AE <- [report, callback, discard],
   59:                  RE <- [answer_3xxx, answer, callback],
   60:                  C <- [true, false]]],
   61:           [[x],
   62:            [[]],
   63:            [[{dictionary, diameter_gen_base_rfc3588}]],
   64:            [[{module, ?MODULE}]]
   65:            | [[[{dictionary, diameter_gen_base_rfc6733},
   66:                 {module, ?MODULE},
   67:                 {K,x}]]
   68:               || K <- [answer_errors,
   69:                        request_errors,
   70:                        call_mutates_state]]]},
   71:          {restrict_connections,
   72:           [[false], [node], [nodes], [[node(), node()]]],
   73:           []},
   74:          {sequence,
   75:           [[{0,32}], [{1,31}]],
   76:           [[{2,31}]]},
   77:          {share_peers,
   78:           [[true],
   79:            [false],
   80:            [[node()]]],
   81:           [[x]]},
   82:          {use_shared_peers,
   83:           [[true],
   84:            [false],
   85:            [[node(), node()]]],
   86:           [[x]]},
   87:          {string_decode,
   88:           [[true], [false]],
   89:           [[0], [x]]},
   90:          {incoming_maxlen,
   91:           [[0], [65536], [16#FFFFFF]],
   92:           [[-1], [1 bsl 24], [infinity], [false]]},
   93:          {spawn_opt,
   94:           [[[]], [[monitor, link]]],
   95:           [[false]]},
   96:          {invalid_option,  %% invalid service options are rejected
   97:           [],
   98:           [[x],
   99:            [x,x]]}]).
  100: 
  101: -define(TRANSPORT_CONFIG,
  102:         [{transport_module,
  103:           [[?MODULE]],
  104:           [[[?MODULE]]]},
  105:          {transport_config,
  106:           [[{}, 3000],
  107:            [{}, infinity]],
  108:           [[{}, x]]},
  109:          {applications,
  110:           [[[1, a, [x]]]],
  111:           [[x]]},
  112:          {capabilities,
  113:           [[[{'Origin-Host', "diameter.erlang.org"}]],
  114:            [[{'Origin-Realm', "erlang.org"}]]]
  115:           ++ [[[{'Host-IP-Address', L}]]
  116:               || L <- [[{127,0,0,1}],
  117:                        ["127.0.0.1"],
  118:                        ["127.0.0.1", "FFFF::1", "::1", {1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8}]]]
  119:           ++ [[[{'Product-Name', N}]]
  120:               || N <- [["Product", $-, ["Name"]],
  121:                        "Norðurálfa",
  122:                        "ᚠᚢᚦᚨᚱᚲ"]]
  123:           ++ [[[{K,V}]]
  124:               || K <- ['Vendor-Id',
  125:                        'Origin-State-Id',
  126:                        'Firmware-Revision'],
  127:                  V <- [0, 256, 16#FFFF]]
  128:           ++ [[[{K,V}]]
  129:               || K <- ['Supported-Vendor-Id',
  130:                        'Auth-Application-Id',
  131:                        'Acct-Application-Id',
  132:                        'Inband-Security-Id'],
  133:                  V <- [[17], [0, 256, 16#FFFF]]]
  134:           ++ [[[{'Vendor-Specific-Application-Id',
  135:                  [[{'Vendor-Id', V},
  136:                    {'Auth-Application-Id', [0]},
  137:                    {'Acct-Application-Id', [4]}]]}]]
  138:               || V <- [1, [1]]],
  139:           [[x], [[{'Origin-Host', "ᚠᚢᚦᚨᚱᚲ"}]]]
  140:           ++ [[[{'Host-IP-Address', A}]]
  141:               || A <- [{127,0,0,1}]]
  142:           ++ [[[{'Product-Name', N}]]
  143:               || N <- [x, 1]]
  144:           ++ [[[{K,V}]]
  145:               || K <- ['Vendor-Id',
  146:                        'Origin-State-Id',
  147:                        'Firmware-Revision'],
  148:                  V <- [x, [0], -1, 1 bsl 32]]
  149:           ++ [[[{K,V}]]
  150:               || K <- ['Supported-Vendor-Id',
  151:                        'Auth-Application-Id',
  152:                        'Acct-Application-Id',
  153:                        'Inband-Security-Id'],
  154:                  V <- [x, 17, [-1], [1 bsl 32]]]
  155:           ++ [[[{'Vendor-Specific-Application-Id', V}]]
  156:               || V <- [x,
  157:                        [[{'Vendor-Id', 1 bsl 32}]],
  158:                        [[{'Auth-Application-Id', 1}]]]]},
  159:          {capabilities_cb,
  160:           [[x]],
  161:           []},
  162:          {capx_timeout,
  163:           [[3000]],
  164:           [[{?MODULE, tmo, []}]]},
  165:          {disconnect_cb,
  166:           [[x]],
  167:           []},
  168:          {length_errors,
  169:           [[exit], [handle], [discard]],
  170:           [[x]]},
  171:          {dpr_timeout,
  172:           [[0], [3000], [16#FFFFFFFF]],
  173:           [[infinity], [-1], [1 bsl 32], [x]]},
  174:          {dpa_timeout,
  175:           [[0], [3000], [16#FFFFFFFF]],
  176:           [[infinity], [-1], [1 bsl 32], [x]]},
  177:          {connect_timer,
  178:           [[3000]],
  179:           [[infinity]]},
  180:          {watchdog_timer,
  181:           [[3000],
  182:            [{?MODULE, tmo, []}]],
  183:           [[infinity],
  184:            [-1]]},
  185:          {watchdog_config,
  186:           [[[{okay, 0}, {suspect, 0}]],
  187:            [[{okay, 1}]],
  188:            [[{suspect, 2}]]],
  189:           [[x],
  190:            [[{open, 0}]]]},
  191:          {pool_size,
  192:           [[1], [100]],
  193:           [[0], [infinity], [-1], [x]]},
  194:          {private,
  195:           [[x]],
  196:           []},
  197:          {spawn_opt,
  198:           [[[]], [[monitor, link]]],
  199:           [[false]]},
  200:          {invalid_option,  %% invalid transport options are silently ignored
  201:           [[x],
  202:            [x,x]],
  203:           []}]).
  204: 
  205: %% ===========================================================================
  206: 
  207: suite() ->
  208:     [{timetrap, {seconds, 15}}].
  209: 
  210: all() ->
  211:     [start_service,
  212:      add_transport].
  213: 
  214: start_service(_Config) ->
  215:     run([start_service]).
  216: 
  217: add_transport(_Config) ->
  218:     run([add_transport]).
  219: 
  220: %% ===========================================================================
  221: 
  222: run() ->
  223:     run(all()).
  224: 
  225: run(List)
  226:   when is_list(List) ->
  227:     try
  228:         ?util:run([[[fun run/1, {F, 5000}] || F <- List]])
  229:     after
  230:         dbg:stop(),
  231:         diameter:stop()
  232:     end;
  233: 
  234: run({F, Tmo}) ->
  235:     ok = diameter:start(),
  236:     try
  237:         ?util:run([{[fun run/1, F], Tmo}])
  238:     after
  239:         ok = diameter:stop()
  240:     end;
  241: 
  242: run(start_service) ->
  243:     ?util:run([[fun start/1, T]
  244:                || T <- [lists:keyfind(capabilities, 1, ?TRANSPORT_CONFIG)
  245:                        | ?SERVICE_CONFIG]]);
  246: 
  247: run(add_transport) ->
  248:     ?util:run([[fun add/1, T] || T <- ?TRANSPORT_CONFIG]).
  249: 
  250: start(T) ->
  251:     do(fun start/3, T).
  252: 
  253: add(T) ->
  254:     do(fun add/3, T).
  255: 
  256: %% ===========================================================================
  257: 
  258: %% do/2
  259: 
  260: do(F, {Key, Good, Bad}) ->
  261:     F(Key, Good, Bad).
  262: 
  263: %% add/3
  264: 
  265: add(Key, Good, Bad) ->
  266:     {[],[]} = {[{Vs,T} || Vs <- Good,
  267:                           T <- [add(Key, Vs)],
  268:                           [T] /= [T || {ok,_} <- [T]]],
  269:                [{Vs,T} || Vs <- Bad,
  270:                           T <- [add(Key, Vs)],
  271:                           [T] /= [T || {error,_} <- [T]]]}.
  272: 
  273: add(Key, Vs) ->
  274:     T = list_to_tuple([Key | Vs]),
  275:     diameter:add_transport(make_ref(), {connect, [T]}).
  276: 
  277: %% start/3
  278: 
  279: start(Key, Good, Bad) ->
  280:     {[],[]} = {[{Vs,T} || Vs <- Good,
  281:                           T <- [start(Key, Vs)],
  282:                           T /= ok],
  283:                [{Vs,T} || Vs <- Bad,
  284:                           T <- [start(Key, Vs)],
  285:                           [T] /= [T || {error,_} <- [T]]]}.
  286: 
  287: start(capabilities = K, [Vs]) ->
  288:     if is_list(Vs) ->
  289:             start(make_ref(), Vs ++ apps(K));
  290:        true ->
  291:             {error, Vs}
  292:     end;
  293: 
  294: start(Key, Vs)
  295:   when is_atom(Key) ->
  296:     start(make_ref(), [list_to_tuple([Key | Vs]) | apps(Key)]);
  297: 
  298: start(SvcName, Opts) ->
  299:     try
  300:         diameter:start_service(SvcName, Opts)
  301:     after
  302:         diameter:stop_service(SvcName)
  303:     end.
  304: 
  305: apps(application) ->
  306:     [];
  307: apps(_) ->
  308:     [{application, [{dictionary, diameter_gen_base_rfc6733},
  309:                     {module, ?MODULE}]}].
